data.title: Bernstein has given SharpLink an "Outperform" rating and is bullish with a 75% upside.
data.description: Research firm Bernstein officially launched its analysis coverage of SharpLink Gaming (NASDAQ: SBET) on October 30, giving it an "Outperform" rating and setting a year-end 2026 price target of $24, representing an upside of approximately 75% from the current share price. (The Block)

data.title: U.S. Appeals Court Upholds Federal Reserve's Decision Against Custodia
data.description: According to Foresight News, the U.S. Tenth Circuit Court of Appeals has ruled in favor of the Federal Reserve in a 2-1 decision, rejecting Custodia's request to compel the central bank to grant it a master account. This decision marks a significant development in the ongoing legal battle between Custodia and the Federal Reserve over access to central banking services.

data.title: Bitcoin Mining Goes Smart In Japan: CAN Deploys 4.5 MW To Support Grid — Details
data.description:
Bitcoin mining is entering a new era in Japan, where it’s no longer viewed as an energy drain. The transformation is being spearheaded by Canaan (CAN), a forward-thinking initiative that integrates BTC mining into Japan’s renewable energy ecosystem to balance power demand and supply. This Is How Bitcoin Fits Into National Energy Policy In an X post, crypto analyst TheGentleTraveler has shed light on a significant and innovative development at the intersection of Bitcoin mining and energy infrastructure. CAN (Canaan Inc
source: https://www.newsbtc.com/news/bitcoin/bitcoin-mining-in-japan/

data.title: Altcoin Season Index Shows Recovery in Cryptocurrency Market
data.description:
According to BlockBeats, data from Coinmarketcap indicates that the Altcoin Season Index has risen to 32, following a previous dip to 23 on October 23. This index reveals that over the past 90 days, approximately 32 out of the top 100 cryptocurrencies by market capitalization have outperformed Bitcoin.

The CMC Altcoin Season Index serves as a real-time metric to assess whether the cryptocurrency market is currently dominated by altcoins. It is based on the performance of the top 100 altcoins relative to Bitcoin over the last 90 days.

data.title: KapKap Secures $10 Million in Funding Led by Animoca Brands
data.description:
According to Foresight News, AI-native Web3 platform KapKap has successfully raised $10 million in funding. The seed round was led by Animoca Brands, with participation from Shima Capital, Mechanism Capital, Klaytn Foundation, and Big Brain Holdings. Additionally, the strategic round was led by Unicorn Verse, with contributions from Rzong Capital and BGX Capital.

KapKap is a platform that transforms players' attention and reputation into digital value.

data.title: Polymarket TVL Surpasses $245 Million with Significant Growth
data.description: According to BlockBeats, data from DefiLlama indicates that Polymarket's total value locked (TVL) has exceeded $245 million, reaching $245.2 million. This marks a 43% increase over the past month.

data.title: Alleged Ukrainian fraudster extradited to US over $500K Conti ransomware plot
data.description:
Oleksii Oleksiyovych Lytvynenko was extradited from Ireland to the US for allegedly using Conti to extort $500K from victims in Tennessee.
source: https://protos.com/alleged-ukrainian-fraudster-extradited-to-us-over-500k-conti-ransomware-plot/
